I am 6 weeks pfc/2.5 weeks post BMX with darn expanders and just willing some part of me to be normal again! My hair seems to be growing so slowly despite my pleading, biotin and minoxidil. I have never been so impatient!

Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2016 02:23AM Paulinek wrote: 6.5,weeks off chemo and staring to see a hairline. I have a lot more on the sides and back and what seems like a quarter sized bald spot right in front :( Is anyone else using biotin or other methods to encourage faster growth? Any success

Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2016 11:45AM Paulinek wrote: inSF- I had taxotere and cytoxan. I am 7 weeks pfc and have hair growing back on sides and back, but very little hair on top and front. I also have two areas on the front that have no hair at all. I am getting nervous too. I have been taking biotin and using minoxidil. I will have to try the Nioxi shampoo next!
